transtype.desc: Prettify the DITA files for a given document
transtype.name: pretty-dita

param.name: args.style
param.desc: Whether to indent using tabs or spaces

param.name: args.require-pragma
param.desc: Restrict the plug-in to only format files that contain a special comment

param.name: args.insert-pragma
param.desc: Insert a special @format marker at the top of files specifying that the file has been formatted with the plugin

param.name: args.print-width
param.desc: Specify the line length that the printer will wrap on (default 80)
